dataset_id: ABoVE LVIS L1B Geolocated Return Energy Waveforms V001
title: ABoVE LVIS L1B Geolocated Return Energy Waveforms V001
summary: This data set contains return energy waveform data over Alaska and Western Canada measured by the NASA Land, Vegetation, and Ice Sensor (LVIS), an airborne lidar scanning laser altimeter. The data were collected as part of NASA's Terrestrial Ecology Program campaign, the Arctic-Boreal Vulnerability Experiment (ABoVE).
